Test4',error:""};var copySlice2=createSlice({name:"copy",initialState:initialState,reducers:{// Stores text objects from textarea
createCopy:function createCopy(state,action){var textObj=action.payload.split("
")// .filter((text) => text.includes(","))
.map(function(text){var newText=text.replace(",","").trim();var value="";var textArr=newText;var name=textArr;value=textArr;return{text:{name:name,value:value}};});state.copys=textObj;var updatedCopy=textObj.map(function(copy){return"{{ $".concat(copy.text.name," := $.").concat(copy.text.name," }}");}).filter(function(copy){return copy!=="{{ $ := $. }}";});state.textarea=updatedCopy.join("
");},foundError:function foundError(state,action){state.error=action.payload;}}});export var copyActions=copySlice2.actions;export default copySlice2;
